spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall layout roughly resembles the 2D plan (kitchen/dining left, living center, bedrooms right, bath bottom-center/right), but several spatial mismatches are present. The kitchen cabinetry/counter run does not match the U-shaped kitchen shown in plan (E2/E4). The laundry + adjacent closet zone in the bottom-left is not faithfully reproduced; the closet configuration/space reads as a different room/usage in the 3D (E1/E2). Hallway geometry and door positions along the bottom/center are inconsistent with the plan’s hall and door swing placements (E2/E3). Bedroom 2 appears oversized relative to Bedroom 1 compared to the stated areas, indicating proportion drift (E4). Window placement/counting does not consistently match the plan on several exterior walls (E2).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall network generally follows the concept, but adjacency and enclosure details deviate. The bottom-left closet (shown as a distinct closet room) is not clearly present as a dedicated closet in the 3D (E1). Bathroom program appears expanded/modified versus plan (additional/altered fixture layout such as a distinct shower zone not clearly indicated in plan), impacting fidelity (E5/E2). Multiple door locations and swings do not embed where the 2D indicates (hall-to-bath, hall-to-bedrooms, and laundry/closet access) (E2/E3). There also appear to be extra exterior openings/doors not indicated on the 2D plan (E5).

furniture_mapping.notes: Living and dining furniture placement is broadly similar (dining table in kitchen/dining; sofa grouping in living), but several rooms have furniture that does not align with the 2D depiction. Bedroom 2 furniture arrangement/scale does not match the plan’s bed placement and room sizing (E2/E4). Bottom-left spaces show furnishings inconsistent with the plan’s laundry/closet program (E5). Some items (bath fixtures and/or built-ins) appear scaled/arranged differently than the 2D suggests (E4).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Camera is a readable isometric/top-down view with good overall clarity. Lighting is clean and consistent, and geometry is mostly neat. However, several door panels appear awkwardly angled/open and visually clutter the hall area (E6). Some wall/door intersections read slightly unnatural (door embedding/hinge depiction), reducing polish (E6). Projection is not strictly orthographic and has mild perspective feel, but remains acceptable.

detected_errors.description: Kitchen layout differs: 2D shows a more complete U-shaped counter/appliance arrangement; 3D shows a simplified/altered counter run.
Bottom-left closet (adjacent to laundry) is not faithfully represented as a dedicated enclosed closet room in the 3D.
Hallway shape and several internal door locations do not match the 2D plan (notably around hall-to-bath and hall-to-bedroom transitions).
Door swing/orientation appears inconsistent with the 2D plan in multiple locations, with doors opening into different directions/clearances than shown.
Room proportions drift: Bedroom 2 appears too large relative to Bedroom 1 compared to the 2D plan’s stated areas.
Window placement/count and positioning on exterior walls do not consistently match the 2D plan (notably along the right and top edges).
Extra/altered bathroom features (e.g., distinct shower zone) appear beyond what is clearly indicated in the 2D plan.
Apparent extra exterior openings/doors are present in the 3D that are not shown on the 2D plan.
Rendering/scene artifact: several doors are shown excessively ajar/angled, cluttering readability and suggesting imperfect door embedding.
